title: Happy Birthday, Ai-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Yay, yaaay! Welcome to the birthday party~ - presented by Ai-san!! Kana-chan is the first one here~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe~, excuse me~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thanks for yesterday. The one by everyone was really fun♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s because Setsuna-chan got fired up~. Though, when Kanata heard that you two were having a birthday party battle, Kanata was surprised<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hehe, it’s great to have more fun things, so why not?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah yeah, that’s right~ And so, with that…. Like what Ai-chan is doing, Kanata-chan will also be presenting….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>An Ai-chan Birthday Party too~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh---!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Why should it only be Ai-chan and Setsuna-chan that can host one! Kanata will do one too-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
